The '''Manipulated Tools: Heavenly Chain Disaster''' is a stronger version of Tenten's [[Twin Rising Dragons]] technique. 

== Usage ==
Tenten tosses her large [[scroll]] into the air above her opponent, then [[Unsealing Technique|unseals]] a myriad of different weapons to rain down with enough force to impale anyone in the immediate vicinity and crater the ground. The weapons move so fast that they appear as white streaks, and due to the fact that the attack covers a large area, it makes this technique quite difficult to evade.
